attributes.action: Material to be recycled to be placed in a single recycling bin and provide weekly collection of all domestic waste materials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sorting of recyclable material should lie with the individual Council and not the house holder. If all recycling material where to be disposed of in a single receptacle then this would encourage recycling and increase the chance that more waste was recycled. Collection vehicles could be adapted to capture all waste in two separate compartments allowing weekly domestic collection to continue.
